data.meta_description: Prints of Margherita of Savoy, Queen consort of Italy, late 19th-early 20th century. Our beautiful Wall Art and Photo Gifts include Framed Prints
data.text:
Heritage Images Photo Prints and Wall Art

Margherita of Savoy, Queen consort of Italy, late 19th-early 20th century. Artist: Giacomo Brogi

Margherita of Savoy, Queen consort of Italy, late 19th-early 20th century. Margaret Adelaide of Savoy (1851-1926) was married to Umberto I of Italy. Heritage Images features heritage image collections. © The Print Collector / Heritage-Images

Media ID 14904352

Giacomo Margherita Necklace Princess Queen Of Italy Savoy Tiara Brogi Giacomo Brogi Margherita Of Savoy Savoie

Framed Prints

Add a touch of royal elegance to your home decor with our Framed Print of Margherita of Savoy, Queen Consort of Italy. This exquisite artwork, titled "Margherita of Savoy, Queen consort of Italy, late 19th-early 20th century" by oˇ»De≤ ‹ from Heritage Images, showcases the grace and poise of Margaret Adelaide of Savoy during her reign as Queen consort of Italy. With her striking features and regal attire, this timeless portrait is a true masterpiece that is sure to captivate any room. Our Framed Print is meticulously crafted with high-quality materials and comes ready to hang, making it a perfect addition to your collection or a thoughtful gift for history enthusiasts and art lovers alike.

Photo Prints

Step back in time with our exquisite photographic print of Margherita of Savoy, Queen consort of Italy, captured in a stunning portrait by renowned artist Giacomo Brogi. This captivating image, sourced from Heritage Images, transports you to the late 19th-early 20th century, showcasing the elegance and grace of Margaret Adelaide of Savoy in her role as queen consort of Italy. A must-have for history buffs, art enthusiasts, or anyone seeking to add a touch of royal charm to their home or office decor. Our high-quality photographic prints are made to last, ensuring your new addition will maintain its vibrant colors and intricate details for years to come.

Poster Prints

Step back in time with our exquisite Margherita of Savoy Poster Print from Media Storehouse. This elegant portrait of Margaret Adelaide of Savoy, Queen consort of Italy, captures the grace and sophistication of the late 19th-early 20th century. Created by renowned artist Giacomo Brogi and sourced from Heritage Images, this poster print is a stunning addition to any room in your home or office. Bring the rich history of Italy's royal past into your space with this beautiful and timeless piece.

Jigsaw Puzzles

Discover the captivating history of Margherita of Savoy, Queen consort of Italy, with our exquisite jigsaw puzzle from Media Storehouse. Featuring a stunning portrait of Margaret Adelaide of Savoy by renowned artist Giacomo Brogi, this puzzle brings the elegance and grace of the late 19th-early 20th century to life. Immerse yourself in the rich heritage of Italy's royal past as you piece together this intricately detailed puzzle. A perfect activity for history enthusiasts, puzzle lovers, or anyone seeking a challenging and rewarding pastime.
